pages.title: Getting Food
pages.text: Doing all that gathering and crafting sure has made me hungry. I'll need to rely on the land for now to provide me with a meal; I can worry about farming up my own grub later, once I've got a base of operations set up.$(br2)I should start moving about to see what's on the menu.

First things first; I'll need something to cook with. Not everything edible I can find needs cooking, but for the things that do, I can fashion a quick and easy furnace out of rocks I got from before. Anything burnable will heat it.
